extension.description:
Indic Transliteration Typing Tool

At present this tool uses Pramukh Javascript Library. It converts Roman characters to their phonetic equivalent in your Indian language

Currently it supports 9 Indian languages

  1. Bengali (Assamese, Bengali, Manipuri)
  2. Devanagari (Hindi, Marathi, Sanskrit)
  3. Gujarati
  4. Gurmukhi
  5. Kannada
  6. Malaylam
  7. Oriya
  8. Tamil
  9. Telugu

How to Use:

  1. Install the Extension
  2. Go to Extension > Module Manager
  3. Select Administrator
  4. Click on 'Indic Writer'
  5. Enable the Plugin
  6. Select 'status' for Position
  7. Save module
  8. Choose your desired language from the top selection box

Known Issue:
- Does not work with Rich Text editor while Design mode is turned on.
